  @verbatim
  ******************************************************************************
  * @file    st_readme.txt
  * @author  SRA
  * @brief   This file lists the main modification done by STMicroelectronics
  *          on tinyhttp for integration with STM32Cube solution.
  ******************************************************************************
  *
  * * original licensing conditions
  * as issued by BSD 2-Clause
  *
  ******************************************************************************
  @endverbatim

=======
### 28-July-2021 ###
========================
   + tinyhttp v1.0.1 (https://github.com/mendsley/tinyhttp) customized version for STM32Cube solution.
   + Introduce static allocation

=======
### 10-March-2021 ###
========================
   + tinyhttp v1.0.0 (https://github.com/mendsley/tinyhttp) customized version for STM32Cube solution.

 * <h3><center>&copy; COPYRIGHT STMicroelectronics</center></h3>
 */
